routes.name: Energy Route (Middle East - Japan)
routes.insight: Survival rate for Energy Route (Middle East - Japan) is under moderate pressure. Critical bottleneck at Strait of Hormuz with 25.2% disruption risk due to intense conflicts within 1500km. Monitoring is advised; contingency routes should be reviewed.

routes.name: Energy Route (Middle East - Europe)
routes.insight: Survival rate for Energy Route (Middle East - Europe) critically declined to 24.7%. Critical bottleneck at Suez Canal with 75.3% disruption risk due to intense conflicts within 1500km. Immediate rerouting away from Suez Canal is strongly urged. Supply-chain contingency plans should be activated.
